changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.attribute_network AS SELECT n.id, p.name AS parent, rel.name AS relationship, c.name AS child, n.inference, n.ordering, n.premise1, n.premise2, n.notes, u.name AS updated_by, n.version FROM attribute_network n JOIN attribute p ON n.parent = p.id JOIN relationship rel ON n.relationship = rel.id JOIN attribute c ON n.child = c.id JOIN agency u ON n.updated_by = u.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.attribute_network OWNER TO core;
